properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 1:53AM MST until February 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...SIGNIFICANT SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED THROUGH TUESDAY
AFTERNOON...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...Sierra Madre Range

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. The
cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite
on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
